node.title: Jimmy Kimmel: Trump’s Covid Test Is the Only Positive Thing He’s Done
node.alt: Jimmy Kimmel questioned how Donald Trump got away with flouting the honor code and not getting tested right before the debate: “Have you met Donald Trump? ‘Do you promise you’re negative, guy who ran a fake university?’”
node.description: Late-night hosts weighed in on Donald Trump’s initial results just three days before his debate with Joe Biden.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "In his new book, Mark Meadows, former President Donald Trump\u2019s chief of staff, wrote that Trump tested positive for the coronavirus before his first debate with Joe Biden in 2020.", "\u201cSadly, testing positive for Covid was the only positive thing he did in four years as president,\u201d Jimmy Kimmel joked on Wednesday night.", "This week\u2019s \u201cTonight Show\u201d hashtags featured viewers\u2019 travel fails.", "Mahershala Ali (a.k.a. Marvel\u2019s new Blade) will chat with Stephen Colbert on Thursday\u2019s \u201cLate Show.\u201d", "Mel Brooks keeps things light in his new memoir, \u201cAll About Me!\u201d"]
